author: kpedro88
body: Apparently #18502 was too aggressive, as part of the package `CaloOnlineTools/HcalOnlineDb` is still used to generate LUTs. In this PR, I restored the minimal package contents needed to make the LUT code work. This PR will be backported to 91X.
title: restore minimal content in CaloOnlineTools/HcalOnlineDb for LUTs
